item.title: Hulk Hogan’s cause of death revealed
item.description: Professional wrestler Hulk Hogan died of a heart attack last week, according to a Florida medical examiner’s report released Thursday.

item.title: Governor declares Aug. 1 as ‘Hulk Hogan in Florida Day’
item.description: Hogan was born in Georgia, but moved to the Tampa Bay area at an early age.

item.description: Manatee County officials say they looking forward to opening the road Saturday, Aug. 9.

item.title: Southwest wind pattern brings early rain to the coast

item.description: After 6 days of Heat Advisories for the Suncoast, Friday will likely give us a break from the heat advisory but not the heat.

item.title: Couple facing death penalty in 2022 Charlotte County murder of Shawn Patrick Armstrong

item.title: Florida carries out record 9th execution
item.description: Zakrzewski was executed for the 1994 killings of his wife and three children in the Florida Panhandle.
